How to move BOM columns in SyteLine

To move columns to positions that are apt for pasting to ERP, right-click on the line that contains the column names, on a row number in the BOM, or in the white space below the BOM; then from the menu that appears click Edit Grid Columns. A window pops up with a list of column names that can be rearranged to the order that you want displayed in the ERP BOM. Do your rearranging and then click OK. Your BOM columns will then be rearranged.

To make your changes permanent, close the SyteLine tab, and when a popup window pops up asking if you want to save changes, click Yes.
